TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ContentPropertyAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class ContentPropertyAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class ContentPropertyAttribute sealed : Attribute

Docs.summary: Contains the name for the content property of the decorated class. Marking a type with this attribute causes the data in that type to be serialized without the enclosing property name tags. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)]
For Windows Workflow Foundation, the following restrictions pertain to <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ContentPropertyAttribute>:
- <xref:System.Type>, <xref:System.Collections.Generic.Stack%601>, and <xref:System.Collections.Generic.Queue%601> are not supported `ContentProperty` types.
- An empty string is deserialized as a null value.
- A `ContentProperty` that binds to a field using `ActivityBind` is not serialized as a `ContentProperty`.
- `ContentProperty` that interleaves with non-content property is not supported in workflow markup.

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string name) cil managed

Docs.param: A that contains the value for the property.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class, initializing the property.

remarks.format:
## Remarks For Windows Workflow Foundation, the following restrictions pertain to `ContentPropertyAttribute`:
- <xref:System.Type>, <xref:System.Collections.Generic.Stack%601>, and <xref:System.Collections.Generic.Queue%601> are not supported `ContentProperty` types.
- An empty string will be deserialized as a null value.
- A `ContentProperty` which binds to a field using `ActivityBind` will not be serialized as a `ContentProperty`.
- `ContentProperty` that interleaves with non-content property is not supported in workflow markup.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The following restrictions pertain to `ContentPropertyAttribute`:
- <xref:System.Type>, <xref:System.Collections.Generic.Stack%601>, and <xref:System.Collections.Generic.Queue%601> are not supported `ContentProperty` types.
- An empty string will be deserialized as a null value.
- A `ContentProperty` which binds to a field using `ActivityBind` will not be serialized as a `ContentProperty`.
- `ContentProperty` that interleaves with non-content property is not supported in workflow markup.
